alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 12:54AM CST until December 14 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 1254 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Larto, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Larto around 105 AM CST. New Era around 110 AM CST. Mayna around 115 AM CST. Monterey around 130 AM CST. Jonesville around 140 AM CST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
